MWC.GUI.Shapes

Class PlainShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Shapes.PlainShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ClassWithProperty, DraggableItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleShape, EllipseShape, FurthestOnCircleShape, LineShape, PolygonShape, RangeRingShape, RectangleShape, TextLabel, WheelShape

    public abstract class PlainShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, DraggableItem, ClassWithProperty
    parent for Shapes. Shapes are screen entities which are scaled using geographic coordinates, not like @see PlainSymbol which is scaled using a screen scale factor
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
